A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Unfortunately Star Wars the last Jedi was a big disappointment\, and I did not like the movie. There was a lot of things left unanswered and unresolved. For all the other problems they faced in the movie it seems like they just took the easy way out. There was very little to no character development\, and the new character Rose added nothing to the plot of the movie if anything she hindered it. Furthermore Chewie\,R2-D2\, and C-3PO where in it for the three  minutes tops. Lastly I did not appreciate how they handled Luke and Snoke\, the movie looked and sounded great\, and there were some cool scenes. That is why I give it a 1.5/5
